messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Kelly
messages.msgSnippet: You know, I ve had this name for almost 43 years. I m STILL uncomfortable seeing it written anywhere. I don t think it s my real name! ~Kelly
messages.messageBody:
You know, I've had this name for almost 43 years. I'm STILL uncomfortable
seeing it written anywhere. I don't think it's my "real" name!

~Kelly <g>

~Kelly, who never sleeps

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Kelly
messages.msgSnippet: Hey... wasn t that *He-Man s* line? (Rewinding memory tapes) Yup - I have the power! By the power of Grayskull! Cringer became the mightly Battle Cat, and I
messages.messageBody:
Hey... wasn't that *He-Man's* line? (Rewinding memory tapes) Yup - "I
have the power! By the power of Grayskull! Cringer became the mightly
Battle Cat, and I became He-Man, the most powerful man in the universe!"

Clearly Kelly has a secret live she isn't sharing with us...

Dar

messages.subject: Re: Kelly
messages.messageBody:
<< I'm sorry to hear of your son's horrible school experience, but welcome to
the wonderful world of unschooling---he's a lucky boy! <G>
~Kelly

Thank-you so much for all the wonderful information! We're lucky to have him
with us today. We'll check those things out.
Kim & Kevin
